text.config.old-animations.section.safe: Safe Settings (Visual Changes, works on servers)
text.config.old-animations.option.shield: Sword Blocking (replacing the visuals for shields with swords)
text.config.old-animations.option.thirdP: Converts third person blocking animation to be closer to 1.7.10
text.config.old-animations.option.affect: Affect New Items (applies visual changes to Tridents and Crossbows)
text.config.old-animations.section.unsaf: Unsafe Settings (Non-visual, may get you banned on servers)
text.config.old-animations.option.fullOl: Allows you to actually break blocks while using items (bannable)
text.config.old-animations.option.disabl: Disables attack cooldown (possibly bannable, won't work on servers)
text.config.old-animations.option.swordB: Slow down from Sword Blocking (could trigger strict anticheats)
